title: Amico 30 Pack Single Pole Light Switch with Wall Plate, UL Listed, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Rocker Paddle Interrupter Wall Switch, Grounding Screw, Residential Grade, Suitable for Home and Business, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #21,461 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #79 in Electrical Light Switches       #79 in Electrical Light Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Widely Used: 15Amp, 120/277V, wall plate included, the switch is compatible with tungsten, fluorescent, and resistive loads; suitable for houses, apartments and other residential locations as well as for corporate buildings, offices, restaurants and other commercial locations
Durability & Stable: Advanced thermoplastic materials, with extremely weather resistant, flame retardant, fade resistant, wear resistance, withstand temperatures of up to 750 ℃

Easy Installation: 2 wiring methods, allow for back insert or side screw terminals. The thin design of the switch leaves more space behind walls, allows for side-by-side use with other sockets or switches
Modern Design: Simple white decorative and stylish Single Pole Decorator Light switches can easily enhance your decor, suitable for most decorating styles
Amico Benefits: 3-Year Product Support! Amico's light switch are certified by UL of a high standard. Our customer support team will also address your concerns within 12 hours

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSolid light switches for an affordable price
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I’m so glad I stumbled across this pack. I replaced all the super old light switches in my house with these. My house looks so much more modern after replacing my switches, receptacles, new paint and flooring. I definitely recommend this for anyone looking to modernize their house.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSwitches just like a switch should switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I installed a smart switch in the study that was this same form factor as this one (large, flat switch button) but still had a standard switch on the other side of the room, so I wanted this switch to match.  Installation was a snap and the switch does what a switch should do.  Perfect!

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWorks well. Make sure you have right dimensions
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These switches are almost identical to those found at your neighborhood home improvement store, and the wall plate is included for a comparable cost. Therefore, this is an excellent substitute if you need a switch but don't feel like going to the store. The installation process is identical to that of any other switch. The only little distinction between this one and the ones from the shop is that it is a little simpler to turn on and off. It is up to you whether that is good or terrible.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Perfect to replace a broken single pole wall switch

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The 15A, 120V single pole light switch from Amico is well-built and UL listed.  The switch’s toggle-action is smooth and secure.  The screw terminals are properly sized and easy to secure.  Frame dimensions and color are an exact match for standard paddle-type switches.  It also comes with a matching single-gang cover plate, but I didn’t use it as I was installing this in an existing double-gang box.  As you can see in the photos, this Amico switch as a replacement for a broken switch at home.  This common failure occurred at the plastic “hinge point” in the center of the switch.  It makes the paddle loose on one side, leading to a poor internal electrical connection - and eventually arcing or failure of the lights to come on.  This new switch appears to be sturdier in its construction, so I am hopeful that it will last longer than the low-quality one it replaced.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGets the job done
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good quality light switch. Easy to install and clear labels for quick connections. When fully installed, it has a nice yellow glow which makes the switch easy to see at night. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSolid switch, easy install and looks great!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This Amico Single Pole Decorator Light Switch with Wallplate worked perfectly as a replacement for a light switch that went bad at my house.The installation was easy; just be sure to turn the circuit breaker off so you don't have power to the switch when installing. The switch works great. It has a solid and smooth action.It looks great, works well, and is easy to install; I recommend this product.
